meaningMnemonic: If you put <radical>dirt</radical> in your <radical>mouth</radical> you're going to <kanji>throw up</kanji>. That's just a fact.
readingMnemonic: When you <kanji>throw up</kanji> it sounds like you're shouting, "<reading>HA</reading> (は)!" Then all the dirt-puke comes out in a wave. It's less of a laugh ha and more of an oh no I'm throwing up ha.
